1.5 APP Actuator Widgets¬∂

  1. Create a new controller and add the following widgets.

  2. Run 1.5_ws_actuator.py.

    Note

    • Open the 1.5_ws_actuator.py file under the path of euler-kit/esp8266 or copy this code into Thonny, then click ‚ÄúRun Current Script‚Äù or simply press F5 to run it.

    • Don‚Äôt forget to click on the ‚ÄúMicroPython (Raspberry Pi Pico)‚Äù interpreter in the bottom right corner.

    • For detailed tutorials, please refer to Open and Run Code Directly.

  3. Each time you rerun the code, you need to connect your device‚Äôs Wi-Fi to my_esp8266, then turn on SunFounder Controller and reconnect.

  4. After clicking the Run/Stop button, you can try to toggle these widgets and you can see the corresponding value changes in the Thonny shell.
